starters.label: Small Chops Combo
starters.description: A tastey party special tripartite to ease your appetite with a combo of spring rolls, samosa and chicken

starters.label: Samosa
starters.description: The india originated food with quite a name, well seasoned minced chicken fried to golden brown served with pepper dip

starters.label: Spring rolls
starters.description: A china discovered snack that is basically stirfired vegetables wrapped in a wafer-thin wrapper served with pepper dip

starters.label: Puff puffs
starters.description: Quite a popular appetizer/party essential, they are yeast-raised, soft, sweet fried dough balls

starters.label: Catfish peppersoup
starters.description: A big hit in Nigeria, it is a light soup with special spices and seasonings, with enough protein based extras

starters.label: Chin chin
starters.description: Fried dough where the dough is cut into small bits and shapes, a sweet and crunchy delight for anytime of the day

starters.label: Gizdodo
starters.description: This is a combination of fried plantain and fried gizzard sauteed in a tomato, pepper sauce, a party favorite

starters.label: Peppered snail
starters.description: Cooked and stirfried snail in a pepper sauce with cut onion slices,a nigerian special for any tribe

starters.label: Prawn
starters.description: They are breaded and fried or seasoned and grilled, quite a delight gaining popularity of recent

starters.label: Beef kebab
starters.description: Another famous appetizer that is boiled and stirfried in pepper sauce with vegetable varietes served on skewers

starters.label: Nkwobi
starters.description: This is small pieces of cow leg/goat leg mixed in a spicy creamy palm oil and seasoned to make a nice dish

starters.label: Isi ewu
starters.description: Isi ewu is goat head cut into bite-sized chunks mixed with a spicy creamy palm oil sauce similar to nkwobi

main-meals.label: Jollof rice and turkey
main-meals.description: This is a popular classic dish that is a rich and tastey consisting of rice cooked with broth, spices and seasoned turkey

main-meals.label: Fried rice and turkey
main-meals.description: This dish consits of fresh vegetables, carrots inclusive stir fried into the rice to make a seasoned delight

main-meals.label: Pounded yam and egusi
main-meals.description: A nigerian special predominant among the Yorubas, made from melon seed grounded with a mix of leafy vegetables served with pounded yam

main-meals.label: Amala and ewedu
main-meals.description: A yoruba special consisting of plantain flour called amala with a soup called ewedu served alongside stew with protein

main-meals.label: Eba and Oha Soup
main-meals.description: An rich and nutricious delight that is particular to the Igbos, made with enough protein served alongside eba

main-meals.label: Beans and dodo
main-meals.description: This nigerian combo is quite predominant of recent, it consists of spiced slow cooked beans served alongisde fried planatain alias dodo

main-meals.label: Jollof rice special
main-meals.description: A tastey special combo consisting of jollof rice served with stew and turkey alongside fried plantain

main-meals.label: Rice and vegetable
main-meals.description: This delicious combo is a mix of the leafy greens spiced and seasoned with proteins of all kinds served with white rice underneath

main-meals.label: Beans, stew and dodo
main-meals.description: Just like it's beans and dodo counterpart, this variant offers a slightly different feeling as it is served along with stew

main-meals.label: Eba and efo riro
main-meals.description: Efo riro, a spinach stew made with chopped spinach stirred into a pepper stew with protein included, served alongside eba

main-meals.label: Pounded yam and ogbono
main-meals.description: Ogbono soup is a local special soup made with ground dry ogbono seeds that is tastey and nutrient-dense served with pouned yam

main-meals.label: Banga soup and starch
main-meals.description: A rich and healthy palm nut soup that is popular and known for it's sweet spicy nature served with starch

drinks.label: Zobo
drinks.description: A tart and concentrated drink made with dried hibiscus flowers, cloves, and ginger, sweeteened and flavored in different ways

drinks.label: Kunu
drinks.description: A nutricious, non-alcholic beverage made from grains such as millet, sorghum or maize usually flavored with spices and sweetened, served chilled

drinks.label: Chapman
drinks.description: A popular cocktail that combines various fruit juices like orange and lemon with itters, soda and sometimes cucumber and other fruits

drinks.label: Coffee
drinks.description: A beverage drink growing popularity often known for it's energizing purposes and unique taste

drinks.label: Cocunut water
drinks.description: A refershing and hydrating drink extracted directly from coconuts, it's a popular drink and can be consumed during the hot weather

drinks.label: Tigernut milk
drinks.description: A non-diary milk alternative made from tigernuts, highly nutritious and rich in protein and fiber and also vitamin packed sweetened with honey

drinks.label: Coca-cola
drinks.description: A fizzy wonder that's know practically everywhere for it's great taste and feeling served chilled with ice cubes

drinks.label: Fanta
drinks.description: A fizzy delight like it's sibling coke that is loved for it's orange color and great taste served chilled with ice cubes

drinks.label: Sprite
drinks.description: A fizz drink that's well known for it's lime/lemon mix and transparent like color served chilled with ice cubes

drinks.label: Grape juice
drinks.description: A healthy but sweet juice made from blended grapes to form a smoothie served chilled with ice cubes

drinks.label: Watermelon juice
drinks.description: A natural drink with miraculouse health benefits at the same time being sweet made from watermelon served chilled

drinks.label: Apple juice
drinks.description: A beautiful tastey drink made from blended apples that has high nutritional benefits and weight loss potential served chilled

desserts.label: Cocunut Candy
desserts.description: Made from coconut fruit thinly grated and fried in balls then caramel coated to make it crunchy, chewable and candy-like

desserts.label: Chin chin dessert
desserts.description: This popular crunchy snack can be enjoyed as a desert made from kneaded dough either deep-fried or oven-baked and in nibble bits

desserts.label: Akara
desserts.description: Beans cake mainly known for it's alias made from bean flour and spiced to taste with onions, pepper, crayfish served hot and crispy

desserts.label: Donkwa
desserts.description: A hausa special prepared from groundnuts and cornmeal, spiced up with chili peppers mixed with water and oil and molded into shape

desserts.label: Grilled corn
desserts.description: Maize prepared by grilling served alongside pears and coconuts, a tasty combo that will make an amazing dessert

desserts.label: Plantain chips
desserts.description: They are made with ripe or unripe plantain sliced into thin fine discs before deep-frying to produce a crunch and tastey delight

desserts.label: Egg rolls
desserts.description: This savory dessert prepared by enveloping eggs in the dough before deep-frying in vegetable oil forming a crisply healthy snack

desserts.label: Kuli kuli
desserts.description: A hausa native special made with roasted groundnuts milled and spiced before deep-frying and it leaves quite a spicy aftertaste

desserts.label: Kilishi
desserts.description: A classic meat delicacy made from beef, mutton or chevon sliced into thin sheets and sun-dried before proper seasoning

desserts.label: Suya
desserts.description: Nicely cut beef seasoned with a unique spice called Yaji before grilling in an open flame served with cabbage, tomatoes and onions

desserts.label: Bole
desserts.description: Made from roasted plantain that has been grilled on an open fire till charring served with roasted groundnuts and little spice

desserts.label: Dates
desserts.description: Packed with natural sugars, fiber and minerals, they are generally considered mouthwatering served ripe, soft and tastey
